reviews.review_msg: Be prepared for backhanded compliments if you don't do the work or present the material during class without your best foot forward. Parin is very passionate about the topics that she covers but they are so similar just feels repetitive themes As a guy, Its hard to get invested in the course when it covers mostly female POV, emotions are felt :(
easy marker if you put effort into your work. lecs are quite boring and repetitive. has good intentions, but teaching style isn't very helpful.

wow, at first, i thought she was very intelligent and looked forward  to the class, as it went on it was obvious she played favorites. She shh'd people, was rude, callous, and seemed to mark on a emotional whim.Tho, her recent book is brilliant, avoid her
